ygData.subject: Re: Najah wants to kill someone
ygData.msgSnippet: Mobster fires back, since he had ONE gun he fired 2 missiles from it at the attackers. The blasts start hitting him, creating chips. You ll be sorry Zardus!

Mobster fires back, since he had ONE gun he fired 2 missiles from it at the
attackers. The blasts start hitting him, creating chips.

"You'll be sorry Zardus! And Mobster, couldn't you wwait a little longer you
overgrown idiot?" Deemos says. He ducks inside and fires the autoguns at the
attackers...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 17, 2000 1:28 AM
Subject: Re: Najah wants to kill someone


> ::Zardus/DevilDuer/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/WarMachine::
>
> DevilDuer waves at Najah, motioning for him to be quiet.
>
> "That's Zardus," he says, pointing up to Zardus, still waiting for the
> Alliance commander's answer to the Mafia's proposal, "Don't fire yet, wait
> for the signal from Zardus for what to do. If we do open fire, though,
just
> shoot at that base," he points to the Mafia base, "And at anyone who
shoots
> at ya."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Zardus growls as he hears Deemos' words, watching Mobster fire at
Scorpina.
> He looks back at the base, activating his comm-link.
>
> "Treaties made while a faction is being defeated often don't last long at
> all," he replies, "And besides, your troops havn't ceased fire."
>
> He switches his comm frequency to Alliance, "Kill them," he says simply,
> firing his plasma launcher at Mobster.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Recieving Zardus' command, Bloodystrike flies to near his leader, firing a
> couple of rockets at Mobster.
>
> Near him, Reptilica flies up, also firing a rocket and Mobster.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> WarMachine roars as he hears Zardus' command, firing off three missiles at
> Mobster as he runs at the bot, attepting to kick him.
>
> He could feel his power begin to lessen. Soon, he'll have to revert back
to 5
> bots..
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> "Hear that? Fire on that big dude!" DevilDuer says to Najah, pulling out a
> small rifle instead.
>
> He fires a few shots at Mobster, although shots of that small size
probably
> wouldn't do squat to a gestalt.
>
>
>
>
